niagara.query_engine
Class ExecutionScheduler

java.lang.Object
  niagara.query_engine.ExecutionScheduler

public class ExecutionScheduler
extends java.lang.Object

The class ExecutionScheduler schedules optimized queries (represented by the optimized logical operator tree) for execution.

Constructor Detail

ExecutionScheduler

public ExecutionScheduler(NiagraServer server,
                          DataManager dataManager,
                          PhysicalOperatorQueue opQueue)
This is the constructor for the ExecutionScheduler that initializes it with the operator queue in which it is to put operators scheduled for execution.

Parameters:
server - The Niagara server we're running in
dataManager - The data manager associated with the execution scheduler to be contacted as necessary
opQueue - The queue in which operators scheduled for execution are to be put
Method Detail

executeOperators

public void executeOperators(SchedulablePlan optimizedTree,
                             QueryInfo queryInfo)
                      throws ShutdownException
This is the function that schedules all the operators in the optimized logical operator tree for execution

Parameters:
logicalOpTree - The optimized logical operator tree
queryInfo - Information about the query that is optimized
outputStream - The stream that returns result to user
Throws:
ShutdownException

scheduleSubPlan

public PageStream scheduleSubPlan(SchedulablePlan rootNode)
                           throws ShutdownException
Throws:
ShutdownException

scheduleForExecution

private void scheduleForExecution(SchedulablePlan node,
                                  PageStream outputStream,
                                  java.util.HashMap nodesScheduled,
                                  org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                  QueryInfo queryInfo)
                           throws ShutdownException
This function schedules the DAG rooted at "rootLogicalNode" for execution

Parameters:
node - The root of the the logical tree to be scheduled for execution
outputStream - The stream to which the output is to be sent
nodesScheduled - A hashtable containing all the logical plan nodes that are already scheduled, since the plan is not necessarily a tree.
doc - The DOM document that will own any newly created XML nodes
Throws:
ShutdownException

setStreamFlags

private void setStreamFlags(SchedulablePlan node)
